dr.evomodel.speciation
Class BetaSplittingModel

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.model.AbstractModel
      dr.evomodel.speciation.BranchingModel
          dr.evomodel.speciation.BetaSplittingModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Model, ModelListener, StatisticList, VariableListener, MPISerializable, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
public class BetaSplittingModel
extends BranchingModel

This class contains methods that describe a Beta-splitting branching model (Aldous 1996, 2001).

Author:
Alexei Drummond
See Also:

logNodeProbability

public double logNodeProbability(Tree tree,
                                 NodeRef node)
Return the probability of this node producing subtrees of the given sizes.

Specified by:
logNodeProbability in class BranchingModel
Parameters:
tree - the tree of the node for which the probability will be calculated
node - the node for which the probability will be calculated
Returns:
the log of the probability of the split below the given node

handleVariableChangedEvent

protected final void handleVariableChangedEvent(Variable variable,
                                                int index,
                                                Variable.ChangeType type)
Description copied from class: AbstractModel
This method is called whenever a parameter is changed.

It is strongly recommended that the model component sets a "dirty" flag and does no further calculations. Recalculation is typically done when the model component is asked for some information that requires them. This mechanism is 'lazy' so that this method can be safely called multiple times with minimal computational cost.

Overrides:
handleVariableChangedEvent in class BranchingModel

storeState

protected void storeState()
Description copied from class: AbstractModel
Additional state information, outside of the sub-model is stored by this call.

Overrides:
storeState in class BranchingModel
